successes.title: Sentri: Welcome to a Smarter Home
successes.description: Sentri is a complete smart home security solution designed to give you visibility and control of your home, no matter where you are.

Pledges.description: Sentri Love: Every ONE counts.  A huge THANK YOU for your support and enthusiasm in making our homes smarter and more secure.  Receive exclusive updates and sneak peeks as we move towards our public launch.

Sentri Wallpaper:  Designer Sentri wallpaper set and our thanks. Be among the first to access Sentriâ€™s designer wallpapers for your desktop and smartphone and stay updated on exclusive updates and sneak peeks.

Sentri Shirt  & our thanks: Truly wearable technology!  Show your support for the Sentri mission by claiming your very own cutting edge Sentri t-shirt, made of 100% cotton. Comes in a size of your choice.

Sentri Early Bird: Get Sentri for the best price possible and be part of our beta community.  Receive one of the very first Sentris as our earliest adopters and get your smart home started to help us all move towards a smarter and safer future -- comes in pearl white.

Sentri Classic: Be among the first to claim your Sentri at an exclusive price.  Help us expand our community and give us your feedback and thoughts as your get your smart home started so that we may build safer and smarter homes together.  Receive one classic Sentri in pearl white.
Sentri Color: Be among the first to claim your Sentri at an exclusive price in one of these colors: steely grey, piano black, tangerine orange, indigo blue, crimson red, champagne gold.
Help us expand our community and give us your feedback and thoughts as your get your smart home started so that we may build safer and smarter homes together.
Sentri Engraved: Take your Sentri to the next level.  Receive a Sentri Classic in pearl white color. Custom engraving included up to 50 characters.
Be among the first to own a Sentri and help us expand our community and give us your feedback and thoughts as your get your smart home started so that we may build safer and smarter homes together.
Sentri Pair: Get 2 Sentri devices of any color of your choices for $240 each.

Sentri Platinum - Limited Edition:  Take your Sentri to the next level.  Give your Sentri a wood grain finish of your choice to reflect the style of your home. Custom engraving included up to 50 characters.
Be among the first to own a Sentri and help us expand our community and give us your feedback and thoughts as your get your smart home started so that we may build safer and smarter homes together.
Sentri Home Owner: Get 3 Sentri devices of any color of your choice for $230 each.
